name: com.modoium.service
description:
Modoium Remote is a productivity tool that lets you instantly test your game by connecting your remote device to the Unity Editor via Wi-Fi.

**IMPORTANT NOTICE**
DO NOT remove this package by clicking the "Remove" button. Instead, follow these steps:
  1) Close the editor.
  2) Delete /Packages/com.modoium.service folder.
  3) Restart the editor.
